name: European Co-Processing Association
goal:
EUCOPRO is composed by Waste Treatment companies that prepare waste alternative fuels and raw material mainly from hazardous waste, with the aim of recovering them in co-processing processes, such as cement kilns.
Its main objectives are:
- Being associated in preparation for legislative, regulatory and/or standardisation measures with a link to the activities of Association members, and to monitor their implementation,
- Conducting or monitoring all studies with a link to the activities of association members,
- Defining the criteria for the best available technologies in a context of sustainable development,
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
- Waste treatment BREF and Waste incineration BREF reviews,
- Industriel emissions regulatory topics,
- Waste regulatory topics included waste shipment,
- Waste studies managed by the Commission (e.g.Hp14 criteria, definition and classification of waste, hazardous waste management improvement, Waste-to-Energy,....),
- Circular economy approach and linked draft regulatory documents,
- Ressource and Energy strategies and efficiency topics
